definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
disproportionate punishment/the punishment is harsher than the crime
not regard as a matter (of any importance)
a person who doesn't manage a household would not be aware how expensive it is (idiom)
pinyin: bu4 dang1 jia1 bu4 zhi1 chai2 mi3 gui4

definition: to fail to keep to one's word/to break a promise

sentences.english: Polit error is the most common cause of plane crashes.
sentences.chinese: 飞机失事最常见的原因是驾驶不当。

sentences.english: Wrong conclusion is prone to come from comparison without historical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 没有历史分析的比较，容易产生不当比附。

sentences.english: Is a dentistry surgical operation again not appropriate leave of linger effect.
sentences.chinese: 再就是牙科手术不当留下的后遗症。

sentences.english: Mishandling the waste plastics will not only cause "White Pollution", but waste resources.
sentences.chinese: 废塑料处理不当，不仅浪费资源，且造成白色污染。

sentences.english: And, you know, I don't glorify any kind of misbehavior or misuse of anything.
sentences.chinese: 而且，你知道，我不会美化任何不当的举动。

sentences.english: Landfills can contaminate drinking-water if they not properly constructed.
sentences.chinese: 废渣填埋地如果构建不当则可能污染饮用水。

sentences.english: Critics say he mishandled the sex-abuse scandal that has rocked the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 也有人认为他对震撼罗马天主教会的性丑闻处理不当。

sentences.english: If used properly, heating materials crashing and extruding furnace lining will occur.
sentences.chinese: 如使用不当，还会出现加热材料碰撞和挤压炉衬现象。

sentences.english: If not ventilated properly, their ballast circuitry can get fried enough to fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果通风不当，它们的镇流器电路会火烫到失效。

sentences.english: Normally, transplanted trees are not flourishing if the seedlings be transplanted incorrectly.
sentences.chinese: 一般说来，茶苗移栽的技术掌握不当。

sentences.english: Neither the player nor the caddie was aware that the caddie was so positioned.
sentences.chinese: 这名球员或球童都没有意识到球童所处的位置不当。

sentences.english: The dictionary is blemished by those long ineffective example sentences.
sentences.chinese: 这部词典差就差在收录那些过于冗长不当的例句。

sentences.english: I think U.S. cities really saw this as a misalignment of incentives.
sentences.chinese: 我相信，美国城市确实视此为激励措施制定不当。

sentences.english: According to our survey report, the damage was caused by poor packing.
sentences.chinese: 据我们调查报告显示，损坏是由于包装不当引起的。

sentences.english: It would not be inappropriate for a pastor to admonish those who appear to have the wrong priorities in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 牧师告诫那些似乎有错误优先顺序的人，并无不当。

sentences.english: However, it can also become a nuisance if we use it improperly .
sentences.chinese: 然而，它也可以成为滋扰，如果我们使用不当。

definition: the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
